title: Question about Scholarships!
content: I'm eligible for a scholarship (MRD scholarship). Will I get a cheque or will it be deducted from the fees? Also, if a cheque is given, will there be an event?

comments.body: It will be deposited in your UBI bank account.
How can one known if they are eligible
A couple of months after results are out they’ll send a list of eligible students via email. There usually used to be a felicitation event at MRD…don’t know if that’ll still be the case
